p: The extraction of the essential oils of fresh flowers (FFL, 10g), leaves (FLE, 40g), branches (FB, 40g), and roots (FR, 40g), and dried flowers (DFL, 10g), leaves (DLE, 40g), branches (DB, 40g), and roots (DR, 40g) was carried out by hydrodistillation in a Clevenger apparatus for 3 h. Subsequently, the oils were submitted to centrifugation, dehydrated with anhydrous Na 2SO 4 and stored at 8Â°C in a freezer. The moisture content was determined using a moisture analyzer (ID50, Marte) at the moment of extraction. The yield of essential oil (%) was calculated and is expressed as milliliters / 100-g of dried material [ 12].
